attributes.action: Close schools in scotland due to rise in covid 19
attributes.additional_details: I would advice the government to help parents whom do not have access to tablets and maybe issue them with 1 tablet per house hold. Also teachers should give the pupils face to face time on skype or via other methods.
attributes.background: Covid 19 is on the rise again. We parents do not feel safe sending our children into school. Schools should go back to using the same method which was introduced earlier this year 'learning from home'

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like petition the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
